short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension which enables you to monitor your Internet status and form communities around status sharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The simplest way to monitor your Wi-Fi status and see if others are experiencing issues, too.

The “Is It Just Me?” Chrome extension is your go-to tool for checking your Wi-Fi connection at a glance. Once pinned to your toolbar, the icon instantly shows your Wi-Fi health with a colour-coded indicator: Green when all’s well, Amber if there are issues, and Red when there’s a connectivity issue. One click lets you check in with a group of friends, family, or coworkers to see if they’re also experiencing trouble—no more guesswork about whether it’s just you.

MONITOR YOUR CONNECTION WITH EASE

- Install the extension and see real-time updates on your connection—no setup needed.
- Join or create a group to share connectivity status with others.
- Spot delays or outages and get the confidence that you’re in the know.

CHECK YOUR CONNECTION STATUS AT A GLANCE

- Enjoy the simplicity of colour-coded icons that update automatically.
- Be instantly aware of your group’s connection status when online, so you know if the problem’s widespread.
- Simple, reliable, and built for peace of mind—“Is It Just Me?” lets you monitor your Wi-Fi status and stay informed together.

Install “Is It Just Me?” and never wonder about your Wi-Fi status again.
